sniper_tower.name: Sniper Tower
sniper_tower.description: The Sniper in the tower shoots at enemy attackers. He's armed with a long-range rifle that deals good damage.

mortar.name: Mortar
mortar.description: The Mortar is an artillery piece that is effective at medium to long range, but can't target enemies right next to it. Mortar shells explode and deal damage to all troops in the area of effect.

machine_gun.name: Machine Gun
machine_gun.description: The Machine Gun turret sprays bullets at the enemy, rapidly dealing damage to massed infantry at close to medium range.

cannon.name: Cannon
cannon.description: Cannons fire powerful, large caliber shells towards one target at a time. This makes them ideal against heavy and armored enemies, but less effective against massed infantry.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.description: The Flamethrower is a close range weapon that deals huge amounts of damage. It's especially deadly against massed infantry. Enemies will also burn for a while after being attacked by the Flamethrower.

rocket_launcher.name: Rocket Launcher
rocket_launcher.description: The Rocket Launcher is a long distance artillery piece. It fires a salvo of rockets, followed by a significant reload time.
